definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: P-glycoprotein inhibited by Ver has no significant effect on PTS metabolism at the experiment conditions.
sentences.chinese: 糖蛋白抑制劑不影響PTS在實驗條件下的代謝。

sentences.english: Both myxoviruses and lysosomes are equipped with enzymes which can degrade glycoproteins .
sentences.chinese: 粘液病毒和溶解體均裝配某些能分解糖蛋白的酶。
含4個相同亞單位的糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Fibronectin (FN) is a high molecular weight glycoprotein.
sentences.chinese: 纖連蛋白是一種高分子量的糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Glycoprotein that is mainly involved in the control of neutrophil elastase activity.
sentences.chinese: 主要控制嗜中性酯酶活性的糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Majority of proteins in organisms are existed in a modulation of glycoprotein, also named glycoconjugates.
sentences.chinese: 機體的蛋白質大多以糖蛋白或稱糖複合物的形式存在。

sentences.english: Objective To study characteristics of oligosaccharides of bile duct carcinoma (BDC) related glycoproteins in bile.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討與膽管癌相關的膽汁糖蛋白的糖鏈結構特點。

sentences.english: Electron microscopic histochemical studies have shown that this interspace contains glycoproteins and lipids.
sentences.chinese: 電鏡組化研究顯示細胞間隙包含糖蛋白和脂質體。

sentences.english: Objective To study the expression of the glycoprotein in atrioventricular cell membrane of the acute myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察急性心肌梗死時心傳導系統糖蛋白表達。

sentences.english: Because of its sugar content, it is called a glycoprotein .
sentences.chinese: 由於含有糖的成分，它被稱爲糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Glycoprotein and lipoprotein were found to exist in cyst fluid.
sentences.chinese: 囊液中含有糖蛋白和脂蛋白。
血小板膜糖蛋白的表達。

sentences.english: Therefore, it was inferred that the hemagglutinin might be a glycoprotein on the virus capsid.
sentences.chinese: 由此推斷，血凝素可能是病毒衣殼上的一種糖蛋白。

sentences.english: Mysterious fruit with special glycoprotein, has the function of conversion taste.
sentences.chinese: 神祕果含特殊糖蛋白，具有轉換味覺的功能。

sentences.english: Miraculin is an alkaline glycol-protein which can transform sour to sweet taste.
sentences.chinese: 神祕果素是一種能使酸味變甜的鹼性糖蛋白。

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
